decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to assemble the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Power Plant, Tower) to generate a large amount of mana quickly, allowing for powerful late-game plays with cards like Ugin, the Spirit Dragon, Karn Liberated, and Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog or World Breaker. The deck focuses on controlling the game through board wipes like Oblivion Stone and removal like Walking Ballista, while also utilizing card draw and tutoring effects to ensure consistency in finding the pieces needed to win the game.

The deck focuses on using cards like Scapeshift and Primeval Titan to quickly assemble the combo of Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Mountains to deal massive amounts of damage to the opponent in a single turn. The deck also includes ramp spells like Sakura-Tribe Elder and Farseek to accelerate mana production, while cards like Courser of Kruphix and Summoner's Pact provide additional value and consistency to the combo. Removal spells like Flame Slash and Lightning Bolt help clear the way for the combo to go off successfully. Overall, the deck aims to win the game quickly through its powerful combo synergy.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board and opponent's resources through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. By using cards like Cryptic Command, Jace, the Mind Sculptor, and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while establishing a strong board presence with cards like Celestial Colonnade and Terminus. The inclusion of card draw spells like Opt and Serum Visions, as well as search cards like Search for Azcanta, allows the deck to consistently find the right answers and threats. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and grind out a win through superior resource management.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive Spirit creatures such as Drogskol Captain, Spell Queller, and Supreme Phantom to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. By using cards like Collected Company and Aether Vial, the deck is able to quickly deploy threats and maintain board presence. Support cards like Deputy of Detention and Path to Exile help control the opponent's board while protecting your own creatures. The mana base is designed to support a quick and consistent mana curve, allowing for a smooth and efficient aggressive strategy.

The main focus of this deck is to assemble the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Power Plant, and Tower) to generate a large amount of mana quickly. This allows the player to cast powerful threats such as Wurmcoil Engine, Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger, and Karn Liberated. The deck also includes control elements like Relic of Progenitus and Oblivion Stone to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through powerful threats and efficient mana generation.

The main concept of this deck is to efficiently ramp up mana using cards like Sakura-Tribe Elder and Farseek, while also controlling the board with cards like Anger of the Gods and Flame Slash. The ultimate goal is to assemble the combo of Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Scapeshift to deal a massive amount of damage to the opponent in one turn by sacrificing lands and fetching multiple Valakuts from the deck. The deck utilizes Primeval Titan to tutor for Valakuts and Khalni Heart Expedition to accelerate the combo.

The primary focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent through direct damage spells and efficient creatures. By utilizing a combination of burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Spike, along with aggressive creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear, the goal is to apply constant pressure on the opponent and reduce their life total to zero as quickly as possible. The inclusion of cards like Searing Blaze and Boros Charm also adds versatility and additional reach to the deck's overall game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing Merfolk creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By utilizing cards like Lord of Atlantis, Master of the Pearl Trident, and Master of Waves, the deck can quickly build a strong board presence and deal significant damage. Cards like Harbinger of the Tides and Merfolk Trickster provide disruption and control elements, while Aether Vial allows for efficient creature deployment. Spreading Seas can also disrupt the opponent's mana base while providing card draw. Overall, the deck aims to establish early dominance and maintain pressure throughout the game.

The deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Power Plant, Tower) to generate massive amounts of mana, allowing for early game card advantage and powerful threats such as Karn Liberated and Wurmcoil Engine. The deck also includes various ways to find the UrzaTron lands quickly, providing consistency in the deck's game plan. Additionally, the inclusion of colorless threats like Walking Ballista and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger ensures the deck can handle a wide range of threats and strategies in the Modern format.

This deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent through an aggressive playstyle. Utilizing a mix of disruption and efficient creatures, the goal is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while quickly building up a threatening board presence. The deck includes powerful cards like Thoughtseize and Liliana of the Veil to control the game, while creatures like Tarmogoyf and Dark Confidant put pressure on the opponent. With a focus on efficient removal and strong creatures, Golgari Aggro looks to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on using low-cost spells and efficient creatures to apply pressure to the opponent quickly. The deck includes a mix of cheap creatures like Delver of Secrets and Grim Lavamancer, alongside efficient burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Burst Lightning. By combining aggressive creatures with versatile removal and counterspells, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a strong offense. The inclusion of cards like Snapcaster Mage and Young Pyromancer provides additional synergy and value, allowing the deck to maintain momentum and close out games swiftly.

The deck focuses on utilizing Prime Speaker Vannifar's ability to search for and play powerful creatures by sacrificing smaller ones, creating a chain of creature combos. The deck includes a mix of mana ramp creatures, toolbox creatures, and combo pieces like Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker and Zealous Conscripts to create strong board presence and close out games quickly with aggressive plays. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creature plays and combo interactions to secure victory.
